data.expected_result: Subheadings for the search results should be hooked to the top.
data.short_description: [iPad only] Quick Switcher's subheadings not hooked to the top
data.steps_to_repro: - Go with your iPad to your direct messages - Click on the search there ("Find or start a conversation") - Search for something like "Test" - Scroll a bit in the search results
